participant_1.background:
My mom is a cancer survivor.
My favorite subject in school was science.
Pizza is my favorite food.
My favorite hobby is reading suspense novels.

participant_2.background:
Unfortunately , my family lives across the country from me.
I graduated with a business degree , and marketing is all that i really enjoyed.
I am recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing.
I like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts.

content.text: My favorite food is pizza. I love all kinds of pizza, but my favorite is probably pepperoni and pineapple.
That's an interesting combination. I've never tried it before.
I'll have to give it a try sometime. What's your favorite hobby?
My favorite hobby is reading. I love reading suspense novels. I find them so exciting and suspenseful. I can't put them down.
I love reading too! I'm not as big of a fan of suspense novels, but I love reading historical fiction.
Historical fiction is great! I love learning about the past.
Me too! I love learning about different cultures and time periods.
What's your favorite historical fiction book?
My favorite historical fiction book is The Name of the Rose by Umberto Eco. It's about a murder that takes place in a monastery in the Middle Ages.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
I'm glad we have something in common. I love reading and pizza. I'm also a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing.
That's great! I'm sure you'll find a job in marketing soon. What's your favorite thing about marketing?
I love being able to come up with creative ways to market products and services. I also like working with people and helping them to reach their goals.
That sounds really rewarding. I'm sure you'll be a great marketing professional.
